casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Earl GOODE, Jr. No. 10A94-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 13, 2006. Lisa Miles, Mark Montgomery, Durham, Diane M.B. Savage, for George Earl Goode, Jr. Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of March 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of *667Time to File Response to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 28th day of April 2006 to file and serve his/her response to Petition for Writ of Certiorari with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of March 2006."
